gen_options: "export PATH={msys_escaped_path} && cd {msys_escaped_module_path} && export MSYS2_ARG_CONV_EXCL="*" && export MSYS_NO_PATHCONV=1 && CC=cl LD=link ./configure --prefix={msys_escaped_install_prefix} --toolchain=msvc [Debug:--extra-cflags="/MDd"] [Release:--extra-cflags="/MD"] --disable-everything --enable-demuxer=matroska --enable-demuxer=webm --enable-parser=av1 --enable-avcodec --enable-avformat --enable-avutil --enable-shared --disable-static --disable-programs [Debug:--enable-debug] [Debug:--disable-optimizations] [Debug:--disable-stripping] [Release:--enable-optimizations] [Release:--enable-stripping]"
build_args: "export PATH={msys_escaped_path} && cd {msys_escaped_module_path} && export MSYS2_ARG_CONV_EXCL="*" && export MSYS_NO_PATHCONV=1 && make"
